title: New: The Babies – Moonlight Mile
content:
Perfect for the rare burst of warm weather we’ve experienced over the past few days, The Babies new single Moonlight Mile may well prove to be one of the finest tracks of 2012.

Reviving the spirit of the early 70’s, it’s fast paced and exhilarating, cornered in with soaring riffs and absorbing, anthemic vocal sections. An indie hit if I ever heard one. Check out Moonlight Mile below, released 14 August and pre-order it here along with B-side Places. The Babies play a couple of shows later in the week, and are expected to release their new album Our House on the Hill later in the year.

7/25 – Brooklyn, NY – Public Assembly (back room)
7/28 – Brooklyn, NY – Union Pool
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
